cells: Qualitative evaluation of current green initiatives

6 grade levels, based on evaluation of factors such as green product offerings, eco-friendly product design, take-back & recycling initiatives, minimization of product impact, promotion of responsible use
Max. 25 pts. for group-wide scope (based on revenue % of subsidiaries). Additional 25 pts. in case scope 3 emissions are included
50 = complete breakdown, 25 = reference to external standards / guidelines, 0 = only total without breakdown

50 = EF of 10 by 2025, 45 = EF of 10 by 2030, 25 = EF of 3 by 2020, 20 = EF of 2 achieved in 2018, 15 = EF of 2 by 2020, incl. scope 3 emissions, 10 = EF of 2 by 2020, excl. scope 3 emissions, 0 = No EF ambition communicated
